name: Empyreal Dawn
description:
In the war-torn land of Edyssa, two opposing kingdoms—Bastion and Crescent—devastate the continent with their conflict. With the kingdoms' armies diverted toward the war, a new class of heroes, Adventurers, arise to protect the populace from monsters and crime. You are Albert Cross, Bladeseer of the neutral party Caeruleum. Accompanying you is Alice Starwell, a prodigious Swordsmaiden. As Caeruleum's leader, raise your party to dizzying heights and etch your name into the annals of Edyssian history!

FEATURES

Captivating Immersion

Stories should be experienced, not just told! Hand-drawn illustrations, an original soundtrack, native voice acting—all come together in classic visual novel format to chronicle our heroes' journey.

Dynamic Choices and Replayability

As Caeruleum's leader, you decide which quests to accept and whom to forge bonds with. Having difficulty with objectives? Try aligning with one of the powerful kingdoms to access their formidable armaments. Or, perhaps search for forgotten relics and unlock our heroes' latent powers....

Each route in Empyreal Dawn features unique experiences and endings, rewarding subsequent playthroughs. Be warned: not all fantasies end like fairytales! One character's salvation may be another's downfall.​

Original Fantasy Soundtrack

Scored by Japanese composer "ruha," Empyreal Dawn features original songs tailored to invoke the wonders of exploring a fantasy JRPG world. Rejoice in humanity's majesty with Crescent's regal strings, or partake in brooding contemplation with Bastion's haunting percussion!

English/Japanese Localization

No content changes and no region locks: receive the original game in both languages!

Professional Japanese Voice Acting

Words depict a character's thoughts, but voices are expressions of their soul. Reading about a tsundere is great, but listening to one is sublime!

For more information, such as character biographies and a staff list, please visit our website.

If you'd like to support our development, please consider purchasing Early Access!
